DOC.brief_summary: Currently, lots of researches aimed at quality of life of patients with peritoneal dialysis and hemodialysis related issues. There is no study related to establish the predictive model of quality of life. This study will investigate the predictive model of quality of life in terms of peritoneal dialysis (PD) or hemodialysis (HD) patients. These results will offer the further evidence to the government to develop the effective interventions for dialysis patients. The optimal goal is to promote the quality care.
DOC.brief_title: The Assessment of Quality of Life in Patients With Peritoneal Dialysis and Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: above 20 years old PD or HD patients conscious clear and no psychosis literate and can communicate willing to participate and sign informed consent Not volunteer subject felt weak or uncomfortable and patients decision to withdraw from the study
